website_summaries.verdict: A very lightweight and low-cost option.
pros: At just 2 pounds, it is very lightweight
Small and powerful tool that's perfect for the DIY crowd
Three LED lights for making project area easy to see
cons: Not as powerful as other drills, but good for indoor projects

customer_reviews.title: Everything I hoped it would be
customer_reviews.text: I will admit there are better ones on the market but this one is perfect for me. I am not a mechanic just a homeowner that needs to do some repairs or projects once in a while. This has plenty of power for me, one with a larger capacity battery would have more but for the price it works perfect. I also already have the 12V drill so the same battery fits in this so now I have backup batteries so if one dies I still have one charged.
customer_reviews.author: RustyJD

customer_reviews.title: The Bottom Line
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is if you want quality,reliability,sturdiness, I could keep on but I think you got my point! I'm an electrician that depends on my impact 95% of my site assignments. I have tried to go with a cheaper drill in the past & in this case you truly get what you pay for which is really not that much considering what you can get done that makes your pay check able to afford it! Bottom line industrial,commercial heck even around the house Black & Yellow is what spins in this guy's hands! Thank you Dewalt!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ward

customer_reviews.title: The best. The impact function is nothing short of outstanding

customer_reviews.title: Best Impact Driver EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I have used my friend's Makita impact driver for the past 6 months and decided it was time to buy my own. With a $25 off Christmas promotion, this driver was the same cost as Home Depot, except you got 2 batteries and case with it! A tremendous deal! As for the functionality, the driver works flawlessly. It's also perfect size and weight for my hands as I am a girl and my hands don't fatigue when using in continuously (I tend to do a lot of home improvement!). The batteries work great and this driver does the job! Very very very satisfied!

customer_reviews.title: Best impact ever

After two years of dropping, tossing and generally mishandling it, it developed a noise when I let go of the trigger, but this didn't affect its operation.. Finally this week, the chuck release gave out. It will not lock the bits in place. I'm keeping it as a spare at home and bought a new one today.

customer_reviews.title: Looks a little weird but it does the job better than most.
customer_reviews.text: Weighs 2 pounds and the battery life is very, very good. I would go with the full size if you use impacts only occasionally or for building big decks and things like that, but if you use them a lot for smaller projects or have arthritis/pain in the hands, wrists, or arms or do any overhead/under-stuff work, this thing rules. It probably won't take off your lawnmower blade, but it'll take every other nut and bolt on the lawnmower right off and drive a box of 3" wood screws after you're done with the lawn mower. Impact drivers/wrenches are the way to go. Leave the drill at home, it's not 1997 anymore...

product_meta.title: DEWALT 12V MAX Impact Driver, 1/4-Inch (DCF815S2)
product_meta.description:
Compact and lightweight with a slim handle and contoured grip, three LED lights that provide visibility without shadows in work areas, a battery that has been placed at the bottom of the handle that allows the tool to stand up between uses. Specs: 950 inch/pounds of torque, 1/4-inch hex chuck that allows users to push the bit in with one hand to lock it in place and accepts 1-inch bit tips and weighs two pounds. Includes one impact driver, two 12 Volt Max Lithium Ion battery packs, one belt clip, one 40 minute, charger, one bit tip, one belt hook and a contractor bag.

AMAZON.COM
The DEWALT 12-Volt Max 1/4-Inch Impact Driver offers convenient features, like shadow-free LED lighting, one-handed loading, and a belt clip. The 1/4-inch chuck accepts bits up to 1 inch. At 6-1/4 inches long and 2.2 pounds, the driver is easy to maneuver in small spaces. The driver comes with two lithium-ion battery packs, each offering 1.1 Ah, and includes multiple torque settings, variable speeds, and a reverse option.

12-Volt Max 1/4-Inch 
Impact Driver Kit
At a Glance: * Compact 6-1/4-inch body fits into tight places
 * Radially-mounted LEDs eliminate work area shadows
 * 1/4-inch chuck can be loaded with one hand
 * Two lithium-ion battery packs and belt clip for ease of use
 * Offers up to 79 inch-pounds of torque
 * Three-year limited warranty; one-year free service contract


Its lightweight, balanced design, and belt clip make this impact driver easy to carry. View larger.Compact Design and Built-In LEDs
At 6-1/4 inches long, the DEWALT driver is designed to fit into small spaces where traditional impact drivers don't, and provides 3,400 impacts per minute. As a result, you get straight penetration and avoid damaging bits from angled driving attempts. The length of the DEWALT means you can apply maximum leverage, enabling you to get the most from this impact driver's 79 inch-pounds of torque.

Additionally, the DEWALT's three LEDs--mounted radially around the barrel--will light your target area for better visibility.

Lightweight Body with User-Friendly Features
With its 2.3 pounds distributed evenly between its ergonomic body and compact battery pack, the DEWALT is easy to lift and handle. The 1/4-inch chuck can be loaded with one hand, and takes bits up to 1 inch. The DEWALT features a built-in belt clip and reverse option for additional ease of use.

Quick-Charging, Long-Lasting Battery Packs
This impact driver comes with two 12-volt max lithium-ion battery packs, each with 1.1 Ah. The recharge time of these battery packs is between 30 minutes and 1 hour.

Warranty Information
This DEWALT tool comes with a three-year limited warranty, a one-year free service contract, and a 90-day money-back guarantee.

What's in the Box
Driver, two lithium-ion battery packs, bag, charger, and belt clip.
